name: Pick which way to move safely
name_original: Pick which way to move safely
description:
This is a simple game 

Moving is only possible in two ways. avoid touching moving obstacles and border

Top-down , left-right use wasd or arrow keys to move space to change direction

This is 100% mobile friendly. Turn on mobile button if playing on mobile phone

You will get joystick and a button to move 

Survive as long as possible

Try to find 5 numbers which is hidden somewhere in this game

All the best and hope you liked it....
